General.Name: Cyrela Brazil Realty S.A. Empreendimentos e Participações
General.Description: Cyrela Brazil Realty S.A. Empreendimentos e Participações develops, constructs, and sells residential properties in Brazil. The company also provides consultancy services related to real estate. It offers properties under the Cyrela, Living, Vivaz, and Cyrela Urbanismo brand names. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua do Rocio, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04552-000
